Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: According to the website, the top 10 travel destinations are Paris, Bora Bora, Glacier National Park, Rome, Swiss Alps, Maui, London, Maldives, Turks & Caicos, and Tokyo. The text also provides a list of 30 top travel destinations, but does not rank them from 1 to 30.

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Some things to do in the top 10 travel destinations according to US News and World Report include exploring landmarks, trying local cuisine, visiting museums, hiking, biking, and enjoying outdoor activities such as surfing and zip lining. Specific recommendations include visiting the Eiffel Tower in Paris, relaxing on Matira Beach in Bora Bora, touring the Colosseum and Trevi Fountain in Rome, staying in an overwater bungalow in the Maldives, and hiking along the Rim and Bright Angel trails in the Grand Canyon National Park.
